argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( ( abs ` A ) = A -> ( P pCnt ( abs ` A ) ) = ( P pCnt A ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_a1i | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ A e. QQ ) -> ( ( abs ` A ) = A -> ( P pCnt ( abs ` A ) ) = ( P pCnt A ) ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_pcneg | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ A e. QQ ) -> ( P pCnt -u A ) = ( P pCnt A ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( ( abs ` A ) = -u A -> ( P pCnt ( abs ` A ) ) = ( P pCnt -u A ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_eqeq1d | |- ( ( abs ` A ) = -u A -> ( ( P pCnt ( abs ` A ) ) = ( P pCnt A ) <-> ( P pCnt -u A ) = ( P pCnt A ) ) ) |
| 6 | 3, 5 | #P_syl5ibrcom | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ A e. QQ ) -> ( ( abs ` A ) = -u A -> ( P pCnt ( abs ` A ) ) = ( P pCnt A ) ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_qre | |- ( A e. QQ -> A e. RR ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ A e. QQ ) -> A e. RR ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_absord | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ A e. QQ ) -> ( ( abs ` A ) = A \/ ( abs ` A ) = -u A ) ) |
| 10 | 2, 6, 9 | #P_mpjaod | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ A e. QQ ) -> ( P pCnt ( abs ` A ) ) = ( P pCnt A ) ) |
